channel.title: PHP CS Fixer on DevDrops
channel.description: Recent content in PHP CS Fixer on DevDrops

item.title: Using PHP CS Fixer on NetBeans 8.0
item.description: Recently on it’s version 8.0 (note: there’s a new stable release, NetBeans 8.0.1 at the present moment), the NetBeans IDE highlighted some new resources for PHP projects. One of the most interesting is the extension for PHP Coding Standards Fixer (A.K.A. PHP CS Fixer).
